step.cmd: In the Order Management page, select a value in the Line drop-down list box.
step.stepresult: The Released page appears, displaying a list of work orders associated with the selected line.

step.cmd: In the respective application page, select a work order in the table.
step.stepresult:
The Current Status page appears, displaying the status of the lots and operations associated with the work order. Refer to each field in the Current Status page as described in the following table.
FieldDescription
STATUSThe status of the serial number or lot is indicated with a color-coded indicator. For more information, refer to the topic.
SERIAL/LOTThe unique identifier of the serial number.
SEQUENCE NUMBERThe sequence in which the operation is performed in the lot.
CURRENT OPThe name of the operation that the operator is currently performing.
USER(S)The name of the user who is currently working on the operation. If multiple users are working on the operation, the number of users appear in the USER(S) field for that operation.
CURRENT UNITThe name of the unit where the lot is being produced.

step.cmd: In the All Serials/Lots pane, select a serial to view the status of the selected serial number.
Select to modify the lot identifier.

info.note: You can modify multiple lot identifiers at the same time.
